E_CANNOT_FIND_MESSAGE.message: Cannot find message for "{{ identifier }}". Make sure the message exists and can be detected by static analysis, more on this on https://radonis.vercel.app/docs/compiler#static-analysis

E_CANNOT_FIND_ROUTE.message: Cannot find route "{{ identifier }}". Make sure the route exists and can be detected by static analysis, more on this on https://radonis.vercel.app/docs/compiler#static-analysis

E_MISSING_ROUTE_PARAM.message: The "{{ paramName }}" param is required to make the URL for the "{{ pattern }}" route. Make sure to supply all required params to `useUrlBuilder().make()`

E_MANIFEST_UNAVAILABLE.message: Cannot get the Radonis manifest. Make sure the server provider was configured properly

E_WILDCARD_ROUTES_NOT_SUPPORTED.message: Wildcard routes are currently not supported

E_CANNOT_USE_ON_CLIENT.message: The `{{ hookName }}()` hook cannot be used client-side
